LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Homesteader.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Homesteader
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Homesteader.baseDescript: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia homesteader. She is conscripted by local warlords.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Youth.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Youth
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Youth.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia youth, pursuing excitement and glory in the war.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArmyReserve.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Army Reserve
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArmyReserve.baseDescript: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia army reserve. She has the skills to survive this war.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Officer.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Officer
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Officer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia officer. Everyone in her family serves in the army.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Laborer.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Laborer
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Laborer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia laborer of an oil company.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArtStudent.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Art Student
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArtStudent.baseDescripti: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia art student. She was admitted by a local art academy, but the war ruined everything.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Veteran.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Veteran
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Veteran.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia veteran. She joins the army again because she has not received pension for months.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_SpecialForce.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Special Force
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_SpecialForce.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Jurnizia special force. She has excellent combat skills, but also some dark secrets.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Warlord.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Warlord
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Warlord.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia warlord. She owns everything, and therefore becomes paranoid that others will take her belongings away.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Spokesperson.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Spokesperson
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Spokesperson.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia spokesperson. Her job is to declare victory and deny defeats.
